CustomField.description: Determine if the constituent has any contact information.
CustomField.formula: NOT(AND(ISBLANK(Phone), ISBLANK(MobilePhone), ISBLANK(HomePhone), ISBLANK(OtherPhone), ISBLANK(Email), ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Business_Email__c), ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Campus_Email__c), ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Other_Email__c), ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Personal_Email__c), ISBLANK(MailingStreet), ISBLANK(OtherStreet)))
CustomField.label: Has Contact Information
